DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare refractive predictability ( prediction error ) Cataract Refractive Suite ( CRS ) standard manual technique one month post-operative
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed bilateral cataract ; Planned cataract surgery implantation ReSTOR +2.5 D multifocal intraocular lens ( IOL ) eye ; Clear intraocular medium , cataract , study eye ( ) ; Willing able complete require postoperative visit ; Able comprehend sign statement inform consent ; Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Significant irregular corneal astigmatism ; History current severe dry eye , retinal/uveal pathology concurrent ocular disease ; Previous intraocular corneal refractive surgery , corneal transplant , retinal detachment ; Any inflammation edema ( swell ) cornea ; Pregnant ; Other protocolspecified exclusion criterion may apply .
